newsitem.title: USA: Campo Electronics says Q3 sales decrease.
newsitem.headline: Campo Electronics says Q3 sales decrease.

text.p: Campo Electronics, Appliances and Computers Inc said its sales for the third quarter ended May 31 decreased by 15.2 percent to $51.0 million from $60.2 million last year.
The company's sales for the first nine months of 1997 decreased 14.8 percent to $195.1 million from $229.0 million for the same period last year.
Earlier this month, Campo said its board devised a turnaround plan which involved the filing for Chapter 11 bankruptcy and the closing of nine unprofitable stores.
Campo is a specialty retailer of name brand consumer electronics, major appliances and home office products.
